name: fishy 3D (itch)
description:
• Controller support 🎮
  • Funny fish noises 🐡

Search every nook and cranny for stars and secrets in order to open up new areas. Find the source of the goop upstream, and maybe this time you can finally really escape . . .

Best played with controller!

Current Sokpop Collection

Join the 3$/month Sokpop Patreon to get this game,
and our previous game Grey Scout, immediately!
